t: Brand approval issues Funko and Hasbro
s: How long can approvals take? Nearly every brand approval I have gotten has been instant based on my performance. Has anyone else had this issue with a brand? They have also ignored my application for Hasbro as well, even though I’ve spent nearly 90k on Hasbro products in the last 4 months.
